doc:
A {@link org.springframework.cache.CacheManager} implementation backed by Redisson instance.

修改 RedissonSpringCacheManager 源码 重写 cacheName 处理方法 支持多参数 @author Nikita Koksharov

methods.name: setAllowNullValues
methods.doc:
Defines possibility of storing {@code null} values.

Default is true @param allowNullValues stores if true

methods.name: setTransactionAware
methods.doc:
Defines if cache aware of Spring-managed transactions. If {@code true} put/evict operations are executed only for successful transaction in after-commit phase.

Default is false @param transactionAware cache is transaction aware if true

methods.name: setCacheNames
methods.doc:
Defines 'fixed' cache names. A new cache instance will not be created in dynamic for non-defined names.

`null` parameter setups dynamic mode @param names of caches

methods.name: setConfig
methods.doc:
Set cache config mapped by cache name

 @param config object

constructors.name: <init>
constructors.doc: Creates CacheManager supplied by Redisson instance
